basic_information.scholarship_name: Alumni and Faculty Scholarship for Philosophy

description: This scholarship is provided for philosophy students who demonstrate high academic promise. Eligibility Requirements Declared Philosophy major Completed at least 15 credit hours in Philosophy Philosophy GPA will be primary consideration Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Philosophy   or SIS_Major_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin   or SIS_Major is Philosophy   or SIS_Major is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Philosophy   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Philosophy   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Philosophy   or SIS_Major_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin   or SIS_Major is Philosophy   or SIS_Major is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Philosophy   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Philosophy   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Greek   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Philosophy-Class Studies Latin

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
